longBusinessSummary: Mufin Green Finance Limited operates as a non-deposit taking non-banking financial company in India. The company offers various loans for electric vehicles, electric charging infrastructure, and swappable batteries. It also provides operating or financial lease to fleet operators for the vehicles owned by the company. In addition, the company is involved in the investment activities. Mufin Green Finance Limited was formerly known as APM Finvest Limited. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Delhi, India.
